telephony_alias_ovh_pabx_sounds_list_inf: Here you can manage the available tones.
Once you have set your tones, you need to add them in the steps of your CCS to use them.
telephony_alias_ovh_pabx_sounds_add_limi: Max size: 10MB, main formats allowed: .wav, .mp3, .ogg and .wma.
telephony_alias_ovh_pabx_sounds_add_bad_: The file name must not exceed 30 characters, and can only contain alpha-numeric characters, underscores, and spaces.
The file size must not exceed 10MB.
telephony_alias_ovh_pabx_sounds_add_file: The file already exists in the tone list, or the same file in .wav format already exists.
